items.product_detail: Power your passions with premium, precision-crafted laptops with innovative features
Work becomes an experience wherever you are, on the world’s most intelligent PCs, featuring built-in AI
Create, consume and connect in style with versatile laptops and 2-in-1s
Power your small business with laptops built to deliver security, performance and enhanced video conferencing
Experience high-performance gaming with iconic designs and intelligently engineered laptops
Take your ideas to the next level with the world’s #1 workstations; optimized for performance, reliability and user experience
Take your game to the next level with split-second responsiveness and dynamic gameplay
Meet the needs of all levels of users with cloud-native security and all-day battery life—for the virtual learning environment all the way to enterprise business level

items.product_quote: Trustworthy quality & enhanced security features for business
items.product_detail: The way we compute. The way we do business. The way we live our lives. Every time business has gone somewhere new, discovered something different, or done something revolutionary, chances are, ThinkPad was there. We stem from a long tradition of firsts.

items.product_quote: Power-packed, versatile, and ultraportable, these devices adapt to any work style
items.product_detail: Lenovo ThinkBook Series laptops boost productivity. From their ergonomically designed keyboard positioning that alleviates body strain, to the stunning displays with low blue-light technology for eyecare, these business laptops deliver convenience and comfort. What’s more, they make you look good doing it—with gorgeous lightweight aluminum chassis that are sure to turn heads.

items.product_quote: Game boldly with the latest tech & a signature style
items.product_detail_header: Style and savagery pushed to the limit
items.product_detail: Everything, from the prowess you showcase—the foes you overcome—the teammates you inspire—the jaw-dropping things you create, leads directly to the incredible things you do in life. Lenovo Legion celebrates that and serves as an epic conduit to both words—the irrepressibly stylish and the indomitably savage.

items.product_quote: Expectation-shattering gaming laptops coming in at a budget price point
